Providence.Leroy Theatre:
Leroy Theatre was a historic movie palace at 66 Broad Street in Pawtucket, Rhode Island. It was built in 1922, listed on the National Register in 1983, and demolished in 1997.


== The building ==
The Leroy was one of the finest and largest theatres of the period in all of New England, built when Pawtucket was at its economic height.
